alert.note: Alert for Northeast Bighorn Mountains; Sheridan Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 6:33PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorm outflows will impact portions of eastern Big Horn, southern Rosebud and Sheridan Counties through 730 PM MDT... At 632 PM MDT, the public reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles northeast of Crow Agency to near Ranchester. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. The main threat is wind outflows ahead of the storms. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Public. At 615 PM, Big Horn County Airport reported a wind gust of 59 mph. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sheridan, Colstrip, Ranchester, Dayton, Lodge Grass, Lame Deer, Crow Agency, Ashland, Granite Pass, Busby, Big Horn, Clearmont, Birney, Leiter, Arvada, Brandenberg, Kirby, Rosebud Battlefield Park, Story and Wyola. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
